evidence.claim: The company adheres to HIPAA compliance for patient data security.
Sense Of Peace Home Care has previously been known as Peace Of Mind Home Care, which also emphasized their commitment to healthcare regulations such as HIPAA.
The company mentions an integration of electronic data interchange (EDI) systems for servicing healthcare transactions.
The services provided by the company ensure compliance with healthcare data standards, including X12.

icp.icp_reason: No public evidence of X12 transactions or API automation related to healthcare data exchange.
